### Read PGE electricity original data
```{r include = F}

years <- 2017:2021
pge_elec <- NULL
for(year in years) {
  quarters <- 1:4
  type <- "Electric"
  
  for(quarter in quarters) {
    if(year == 2021 & quarter == 3) break
    filename <- 
      paste0(
        "pge/PGE_",
        year,
        "_Q",
        quarter,
        "_",
        type,
        "UsageByZip.csv"
      )
  
    print(filename)
    
    temp <- read_csv(filename)
    
    pge_elec <- rbind(pge_elec,temp)
    # Note rbind requires field names to be consistent for every new thing that you add.
  }

}
saveRDS(pge_elec, "pge_elec.rds")
```

### Read PGE gas original data

### Organize data
```{r include = F}
pge_elec_final <-
  pge_elec %>% 
  filter(
    CUSTOMERCLASS %in% 
      c(
        "Elec- Residential",
        "Elec- Commercial"
      )
  ) %>% 
  select(
    -c(COMBINED, AVERAGEKWH)
  ) %>%  
  group_by(MONTH, YEAR, CUSTOMERCLASS) %>% 
  summarize(
    TOTALKWH = 
      sum(
        TOTALKWH, 
        na.rm = T
      ),
    TOTALCUSTOMERS =
      sum(
        TOTALCUSTOMERS,
        na.rm = T
      )
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    AVERAGEKWH =
      TOTALKWH/TOTALCUSTOMERS
  )

pge_elec_final$DATE <- paste(pge_elec_final$YEAR,"-", pge_elec_final$MONTH)

```

```{r include = F}
pge_gas_final <-
  pge_gas %>% 
  filter(
    CUSTOMERCLASS %in% 
      c(
        "Gas- Residential",
        "Gas- Commercial"
      )
  ) %>% 
  select(
    -c(COMBINED, AVERAGETHM)
  ) %>% 
  group_by(MONTH, YEAR, CUSTOMERCLASS) %>% 
  summarize(
    TOTALTHM = 
      sum(
        TOTALTHM, 
        na.rm = T
      ),
    TOTALCUSTOMERS =
      sum(
        TOTALCUSTOMERS,
        na.rm = T
      )
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    AVERAGETHM =
      TOTALTHM/TOTALCUSTOMERS
  )
pge_gas_final$DATE <- paste(pge_gas_final$YEAR,"-", pge_gas_final$MONTH)
```


## Plot

```{r include = F}
pge_elec_chart <-
  pge_elec_final %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(
    aes(
      x = DATE,
      y = TOTALKWH,
      fill = CUSTOMERCLASS
    ),
    stat = "identity",
    position = "stack"
  ) +
  labs(
    x = "Y-M",
    y = "kWh",
    title = "PG&E Territory Monthly Electricity Usage, 2019",
    fill = "Electricity Type"
  )
```
